deathCries: My kingdom is yours... if you can keep it...
Time takes even the greatest of men...
You've killed me a thousand times, but those were just dreams...
Molten One, save me from this unending nightmare!
Let me out... please, let me out...
I awaken from this nightmare... at last...
The end of the cycle of madness... until next time...
I thought myself better than you... but you and I are bound to waltz together forever...
My only consolation... is that I am not alone in this torture... see you soon...
You stand victorious, your heart's desire... the Atlas provides... your addiction...

Kirac... sent you? You must keep him out of the Atlas... I cannot be saved... he will find only his own doom, endlessly pursuing my rescue... he will end up... like me...

Tell Zana... she was right... to seal us away... Sirus must never... be...
... tell my brother... that I cannot be saved...
Keep Kirac... out of the Atlas... at all costs...
A brief moment of sanity... it never lasts...
You left me there, Zana... centuries alone in the Atlas... all I wanted was to feel something again...
Impressive... but now you will fight on <italic>{my} lands.
The Atlas will fuel me. Behold. ...What?! No!
I always knew it would be you... Zana... to make me feel something... one last... time...
You have accomplished nothing... I have achieved eternal life...
You are only delaying the inevitable.
I cannot die. You know this.
Beidat beckons just beyond the door...
Well done! Come in and speak with the others.
I have not yet... earned my rest!
I... will not be... a slave to evil!
Do not let them... leave alive...
We could have been... so much more.
No! <i>{No!} My son! What have they done!
No! There is still time! We will have utopia!
You are worthy... take my staff...
Take my staff... carry on her influence...
Auria! I have found your next... bearer...
The madness... It consumed my being. Oriana used it against me.
I found messages... From the desert.
Yes... Find her. Kill her. But first, please stop the madness.
The Faridun have never organized in such numbers before. They fight as if they no longer fear death!
Jamanra! I return you to the embrace of death!
You have no idea... what you've done...
The Faridun will not be forgotten...
You have accomplished... nothing. Oriana will prevail... and the Faridun will rule the Vastiri.
What are.... you waiting for... Give me.... a warrior's death!
Countess? My Queen... she gave us power... she gave us respect... We would have been fools not to try...
She's taking it... far from here... it's beyond you now.
You thought us weak... we have proven... how wrong you were...
So long as you know me, I will always exist...
Why do you hate us for wanting to exist?
Hahahaha! Your path will always lead back to me...
Gah! No! Do not fail me... Not now!
Ugh... how could this happen...? All I have done. All that I sacrificed...
Hmm... the legacy of the Vaal must be protected... I do know of a way to contain the Beast.
The King will have your head!
Ugh... my service is finally over...
Ugh... who are you to overthrow your fate?
Ugh, this is not the future I had forseen!
This cannot be... it is not my time...
You would have made a worthy <i>{Sekhema}...
This power serves a new master...
Tell 'em... ol' Drusian went out like a legend...
Ya weren't going all-out, is all!
They just caught ya off-guard, is all!
Oh, they just caught ye off-guard, is all!
They just got lucky, is all!
Bah, they just got lucky, is all!
An' that's the way life goes...
Don't end up like them eh?
Oh, you're not goin' back in there are ya?
You're not goin' back in there are ya?
Ah, maybe it's a bit too much for ya?
Maybe it's a bit too much for ya.
It's alright to take a rest once in a while...
Hey - It's alright to take a rest once in a while...
Ain't you meant to be a party?
What was it this time hmm?
This vessel breaks... but the seed remains...
Why did it come to this? We were trying to... save you...
My lady... you must take your leave! I will bury these fools... I will bury it all! For the Saviourrr!
The world will be devoured... by Darkness...
You exhaust... my vessel... for now...
This was to be... my coronation...
The Serpent Clan shall rise again...
Strike us down... we will return...
The Thane will have your head...
Your kin will rot here too...
Ugh! Take me pochiti! I am yours! Give me eternity!
